    public class Jetty93InstrumentedConnectionFactory
extends org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.ContainerLifeCycle
implements org.eclipse.jetty.server.ConnectionFactory
    A version com.codahale.metrics.jetty9.InstrumentedConnectionFactory, which supports Jetty 9.3 API. NOTE: This class could be replaced, when dropwizard-metrics-jetty9 will support Jetty 9.3.
